_sText:
Well heres a nice remak of the orignal . The first ver was poor fps and lighting and was thrown together, as it was mooses first map and at the time i was still new at mapping so we helped the best we could. Weve all got alot better since then so we are going back and trying to clean up and make the classics better and give them new life , so our mapper Mwuhahaha took this over  and brought it new life and made it look and run so much better i had to touch up a few other things to raise the fps a lil more but here it is.
                                                         enjoy
                                                    Team GHS
